activity.approve: You can start by approving some MANA on your {settings_link}

activity.start: You are able to start trading at the {marketplace}!

asset_buy.please_allow: Please go to {settings_link} and allow the LegacyMarketplace contract to operate MANA on your behalf
asset_buy.please_allow_new_marketplace: Please go to {settings_link} and allow the Marketplace contract to operate MANA on your behalf

asset_cancel.about_to_cancel: You are about to cancel the sale of {name}.

errors.description_limit: The description should be lower than {length} characters
errors.name_max_limit: The name should be lower than {length} characters

asset_manage.address_permission: This address will be able to update the contents of this {asset_type}
asset_manage.give_permission: Give permission to update contents of {asset_name}

asset_publish.already_sold: This {asset_name} is already on sale for {value}

asset_publish.set_new_asset_price: Set the new price or expiration date for {asset_name}.

auction.description_after_start: The LAND auction has started, participate and buy LAND before it ends!
auction.description_before_start: Participate in the LAND auction on December 10 and buy LAND!
auction.title: Decentraland LAND Auction

auction_modal.authorization_description: Before you can purchase any LAND in the auction using {token}, you must first authorize the {contract_link} contract to access and operate it in your behalf
auction_modal.confirmation_description: You are about to purchase {parcels} parcels of LAND for {price} {token}
auction_modal.description: There are just two things you need to do before you can start. First, you need to select the tokens you want to buy LAND with. Next, you have to authorize a new smart contract to access those tokens when you buy LAND.

auction_page.conversion_disclaimer: * Price increased {fee}% due to conversion fees
auction_page.description: Find the LAND you want to buy
auction_page.empty_message: Find the parcels you want to buy, and add them to your cart. For more information, watch the {video_tutorial_link} or read the {blog_post_link}
auction_page.max_amount_disclaimer: * Kyber reserves for {token} are not enough to trade {amount} MANA
auction_page.maximum_parcels_message: If you try to buy more than {max} LAND in a single transaction it'll fail. You must submit this transaction and then buy more parcels in a subsequent transaction.
auction_page.maximum_parcels_title: You reached the maximum LAND per transaction
auction_page.parcels_tooltip: You can only purchase up to {max} parcels at a time
auction_page.title: LAND Cart
auction_page.token_tooltip: Select the token you want to purchase LAND with

auction_splash.cta_title: Enter your mail and we’ll let you know!

authorization.allow: Authorize the {contract_link} to operate {symbol} on your behalf

authorization.approved: You authorized the {contract_link} to operate {symbol} on your behalf
authorization.disallowed: You unauthorized the {contract_link} to operate {symbol} on your behalf
authorization.disapproved: You unauthorized the {contract_link} to operate {symbol} on your behalf

buy_mana.amount_too_big: This amount is too big for the Bancor Network
buy_mana.not_enough: You don't have enough ETH to pay for this
buy_mana.title: Convert ETH to MANA

derivation_path.invalid: You have set a wrong derivation path for your wallet. Your derivation path must follow pattern 44'/60|61'/x'/n

estate_detail.dissolve_desc: You are going to dissolve the estate {name}
estate_detail.maximum_parcels_message: If you add or remove more than {max} parcels in a single transaction it may run out of gas. You can submit this transaction and then add or remove more parcels in a subsequent transaction by editing the estate.
estate_detail.maximum_parcels_title: You reached the maximum parcels per transaction

estate_dissolve.too_big_desc: When an estate has over {max} parcels a transaction to dissolve it may run out of gas. You should remove parcels by editing the estate and dissolve it when it has {max} parcels or less.

estate_edit.name: Name
estate_edit.subtitle: Set a name and description for your estate.

estate_select.description: Select parcels adjacent to each other
estate_select.edit_selection: Select the parcels on the map
estate_select.new_selection: Select the parcels on the map for your new Estate
estate_select.tx_to_be_send: You will send a transaction to {action} parcels: {parcels}

fatfinger_modal.description: You are going to publish the {asset_name} for {price}
fatfinger_modal.re-enter: Please re-enter the price to confirm

global.transfer_irreversible: Remember that transferring is an irreversible operation.

homepage.hero_title: Choose your ideal location in Genesis City

errors.minimum_payable: Payable at should be greater than {minimum} days
errors.parcel_price: Amount required should be less than parcel price

mortgage.network_fee: You need at least {amount} in your balance due to network fees
mortgage.partial_payment_desc: You are about to make a partial payment for the mortgage to buy the land {parcel_name}. Outstading amount: {outstanding_amount}

mortgage.request_land: You are about to request a mortgage for {parcel_name} valued in {parcel_price}

parcel_edit.set_name_and_desc: Set a name and description for {parcel_name}.
parcel_edit.warning_tooltip: This will be used to show your scene. Update only if you know what you are doing.

settings.authorization_error: We couldn't load your authorizations, please try again
settings.authorization_error_contact: If the error persist don't hesitate to contact us
settings.pending_tx: Transaction pending, click the loading to go to your activity for a detailed status

sign_in.account_unlocked: Make sure your account is unlocked
sign_in.intro: First off you’ll need a safe place to keep all your LAND.

options.desktop: You can use the {metamask_link} extension or a hardware wallet like {ledger_nano_link}.
options.mobile: You can use mobile browsers such as {coinbase_link} or {imtoken_link}.

sign_in_notice.message: You need to connect your wallet to access this page

terms_modal.also_agree: You also agree to our {privacy_policy_link}, which describes how we process your information.
terms_modal.by_agreeing: By choosing "I agree" below, you agree to our {terms_of_service_link}.
terms_modal.explanation: This dApp interacts with a decentralized exchange that runs on the Ethereum blockchain.
terms_modal.title: Welcome to Decentraland's LAND Marketplace

transaction.bid: You bought {parcel_count} {parcel_count, plural, one {parcel} other {parcels}} at the auction
transaction.cancel_mortgage: You cancel a Mortgage to buy the parcel {parcel_link}
transaction.create_mortgage: You requested a Mortgage to buy the parcel {parcel_link}
transaction.edit: You edited {parcel_link} with the name "{name}" and description "{description}"
transaction.edit_estate_metadata: You edited estate {estate_id} with the name "{name}" and description "{description}"
transaction.manage: You gave {address_link} permission to update the contents of {asset_link}
transaction.manage_revoked: You revoked {address_link} permission to update the contents of {asset_link}
transaction.mortgage_mana: You {action} the {mortgage_contract_link} to operate MANA on your behalf
transaction.mortgage_rcn: You {action} the {mortgage_contract_link} to operate RCN on your behalf
transaction.pay_mortgage: You made a partial payment of {amount} MANA for the mortgage to buy the parcel {parcel_link}

parcel.still_pending: {parcel_name} still has {transactions_count} pending {transactions_count, plural, one {transaction} other {transactions}}

transaction_status.see_activity: To see your transaction history, visit your {activity_link}.

text.failed: Your transaction failed, you can try sending a new one.
text.pending: The transaction is waiting to be confirmed.

transaction_tooltips.dropped: This transaction has been dropped by the network. This could happen temporarily if you've sent a replacement transaction.
transaction_tooltips.loading: Fetching transaction status. If this takes too long, you might need to send another transaction with higher gas.
transaction_tooltips.queued: This transaction can't be processed yet because there is an earlier pending transaction
transaction_tooltips.replaced: Another transaction with the same nonce as this one was mined instead

transfer_estate.about_to_transfer: You're about to transfer the estate {name}.

transfer_mana.irreversible: Remember that transferring MANA is an irreversible operation.
transfer_mana.title: Transfer MANA

transfer_parcel.cant_transfer: This LAND can't be transferred because it's on sale.
